https://tmrev.io/movie/877118-A Life's Work 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6GoJIwM5MopuHeMOn88PJ9e0icQ.jpg In the fifteen years since leaving the job he hated, D.J. Blanton has thrown himself into his practice as a blacksmith, building thousands of pieces in his home shop. A Life’s Work considers the intersection of art and life—the curiosities we are born with and the legacies we leave behind. A Life's Work
